mapper.select: SELECT g.*, b.user_uid, b.user_identity, b.user_phone, b.user_name, b.user_sex, b.user_age, b.user_avatar, b.user_reg_time FROM avatar.gov_info g JOIN avatar.basis_user_info b ON g.user_id = b.id WHERE g.id = #{id}

SELECT g.*, b.user_uid, b.user_identity, b.user_phone, b.user_name, b.user_sex, b.user_age, b.user_avatar, b.user_reg_time FROM avatar.gov_info g JOIN avatar.basis_user_info b ON g.user_id = b.id WHERE b.user_phone = #{phone}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO avatar.gov_info (user_id, password, enabled) VALUES (#{userId}, #{password}, #{enabled});
